about.description: Hello! I'm Jules ANTOINE. Engineering student at ESIEA, specializing in Software Engineering, Entrepreneurship, and Innovation. Currently Product Owner at Meta-Coaching, I bridge business and tech, managing Agile teams, product evolution, and platform maintenance. Passionate about technology and innovation, I thrive on solving complex challenges

skills.title: Special Skills
skills.1.description: Creating clean and professional web designs using the latest trends and technologies.
skills.2.description: Ability to design intuitive interfaces and write detailed functional specifications (User Stories, Wireframes).
skills.3.description: Experience in managing complex projects, managing stakeholders and meeting deadlines and resources.
skills.4.description: Mastery of monitoring tools (Redmine, Gitea), as well as development technologies (Python, Java, JavaScript, Docker, AWS, Quasar Framework).
skills.5.description: Ability to analyze user feedback, adjust product strategies and present results to decision-makers.
skills.6.description: Experience in managing innovative projects and strategic decision-making.

project1.title: Project Alpha
project1.description: A cutting-edge web development project leveraging modern technologies.

project2.title: Project Beta
project2.description: A mobile application designed to enhance productivity and user experience.

project3.title: Project Gamma
project3.description: A data analytics tool for better decision-making and insights.

project4.title: Project Delta
project4.description: An AI-powered chatbot for customer support automation.

project5.title: Project Epsilon
project5.description: A cloud-based platform for team collaboration and task management.

project6.title: Project Zeta
project6.description: A cybersecurity solution ensuring high-level encryption and protection.

cv.intro: Hello! I am Jules ANTOINE, a Product Owner and computer engineering student. I bridge the gap between business needs and technical execution, ensuring high-quality deliverables with a seamless user experience. Passionate about Agile methodologies, I specialize in product roadmap management, backlog prioritization, and optimizing development processes to maximize business value. My expertise extends to project coordination, functional design, and continuous product improvement.

work.description1: Developed and maintained the company's website and internal tools.
work.description2: Implemented new UI/UX designs and improved website responsiveness.

educationDetails.description1: Graduated with a specialization in science and mathematics.

cv.hobbiesDescription: Playing video games, coding side projects, and exploring new technologies.
